metadata.title: Timero - Free Online Timer, Stopwatch, Alarm & World Clock | Time Management Tool
metadata.description: Free online timer and clock tool with countdown timer (10s-16h), precise stopwatch with lap timer, multi-alarm system, and world clock. Perfect for productivity, workouts, cooking, and time tracking. No signup required.
metadata.keywords: online timer, countdown timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, world clock, time management, Pomodoro timer, workout timer, cooking timer, free timer, online stopwatch, digital clock, time tracking, productivity timer, interval timer, lap timer, multi-alarm, timezone converter, world time, Timero

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
# Privacy Policy for Timero

## Introduction

Welcome to Timero, a **free online time management tool** that combines countdown timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, and world clock features. Your privacy is of utmost importance to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

**Important**: Timero's core features (timer, stopwatch, alarm, and world clock) are completely **free to use and require no registration**. You can use all these features without creating an account or providing any personal information. Your timer settings, alarms, and preferences are stored locally in your browser.

## Information We Collect

### Core Features (No Registration Required)

When you use Timero's core features without registering:

- **Local Storage**: Your timer presets, alarm settings, world clock configurations, theme preferences, and sound selections are stored locally in your browser using browser local storage. This data never leaves your device.
- **No Personal Data**: We do not collect any personal information when you use the core features.
- **No Tracking**: We do not track your usage or behavior when using the free features.

### Technical Information

We may automatically collect minimal technical information:

- **Browser Information**: Browser type and version to ensure compatibility
- **Device Information**: Device type (desktop, mobile, tablet) for optimization
- **Basic Analytics**: Anonymous usage statistics to improve service quality (only for website visitors, not for core feature usage)

## Cookies and Local Storage

Timero uses:

- **Local Storage**: To save your preferences, alarms, and timer settings directly in your browser
- **Session Cookies**: For maintaining your session if you choose to create an account
- **Analytics Cookies**: Anonymous usage statistics to improve our website (can be disabled in browser settings)

You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect account functionality.

## Data Storage and Security

- **Local Data**: All core feature data (timers, alarms, preferences) is stored locally in your browser and never transmitted to our servers.
- **Account Data**: If you create an account, your account information is stored securely on our servers with encryption and access controls.
- **Security Measures**: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure connections (HTTPS), and access controls.
- **No Guarantee**: While we take security seriously, no method of electronic storage or transmission is 100% secure.

## Information Sharing and Disclosure

We **do not sell, trade, or rent** your personal information. We only share information in the following limited circumstances:

- **Legal Requirements**: To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests from authorities
- **Service Providers**: With trusted third-party service providers who assist in operating our website (e.g., hosting, analytics), subject to strict confidentiality agreements
- **Protection**: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users

## Your Rights

- **Access**: You can access and manage your local browser data at any time through your browser settings
- **Deletion**: You can delete your local data by clearing your browser's local storage
- **Account Data**: If you have an account, you can request access to, modification of, or deletion of your account data by contacting us
- **Opt-Out**: You can choose not to create an account and use only the free features

## Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on this page. The "Last Updated" date will be revised accordingly. Your continued use of Timero after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

## Contact Us

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:

**Email**: service@toolina.com

Thank you for trusting Timero with your time management needs!

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.content:
# Terms of Service for Timero

## Introduction and Acceptance of Terms

Welcome to **Timero**, a free online time management tool that combines countdown timer (10 seconds to 16 hours), precise stopwatch with lap functionality, multi-alarm system, and world clock features. By accessing or using Timero, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our service.

**Key Points**:
- Timero's core features are **completely free** and **require no registration**
- You can use timer, stopwatch, alarm, and world clock features without creating an account
- Your settings and preferences are stored locally in your browser
- Account creation is optional for accessing advanced features

## Description of Service

Timero provides users with a comprehensive time management platform:

- **Countdown Timer**: Set custom timers from 10 seconds to 16 hours, with preset options and custom time settings
- **Stopwatch**: Precise time tracking with lap functionality for measuring performance and activities
- **Alarm Clock**: Set multiple alarms with custom labels, repeat schedules (once, daily, weekdays, weekends), and notification sounds
- **World Clock**: View time across multiple timezones simultaneously with custom city support
- **Customization**: Personalize theme colors, backgrounds, notification sounds, and interface settings
- **Cross-Platform**: Works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with responsive design

## Free Use and Optional Accounts

1. **Free Features**: All core time management features are available free of charge and require no registration. You can use timer, stopwatch, alarms, and world clock immediately without creating an account.

2. **Optional Account Creation**: Account creation is optional and may be required only for:
   - Advanced features (if any are introduced)
   - API access (if available)
   - Cloud synchronization (if available)
   - Premium features (if offered)

3. **Account Security** (if you create an account):
   - You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
   - You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
   - You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

## Acceptable Use

You agree to use Timero in accordance with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations. You agree not to:

- Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
- Interfere with or disrupt the security or performance of the service
- Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the service
- Use automated systems to access the service in a manner that sends more requests than a human could reasonably produce
- Transmit any malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
- Violate any third-party rights, including intellectual property rights

## Intellectual Property Rights

All content provided through Timero, including but not limited to software, design, documentation, logos, and trademarks, is protected under copyright and intellectual property law. The copyright owner of Timero is **Timero Team**.

- You acknowledge that you do not own the underlying technology or intellectual property that makes up the Timero service
- You agree to respect the intellectual property rights of Timero and any third parties
- You may use Timero for personal or commercial time management purposes, but the Timero platform and its underlying technology remain the property of Timero Team
- You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of the Timero service without explicit written permission

## Privacy and Data Collection

Timero respects your privacy. For detailed information about how we collect, use, and protect your information, please refer to our [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy).

Key points:
- Core features work without collecting personal information
- Your timer settings, alarms, and preferences are stored locally in your browser
- Account information (if you choose to create an account) is collected only as necessary to provide account-related features
- We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information

## Service Availability and Modifications

- **Availability**: We strive to keep Timero available 24/7, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. The service may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or unforeseen circumstances.
- **Modifications**: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time, with or without notice.
- **Feature Changes**: We may add, modify, or remove features at our discretion.

## Pricing (if applicable)

- **Free Features**: Core features (timer, stopwatch, alarm, world clock) are free and will remain free
- **Premium Features** (if offered): Any premium features will be clearly marked, and pricing will be disclosed before purchase
- **Refunds**: Refund policies, if applicable, will be clearly stated at the time of purchase
- **Price Changes**: If we introduce paid features, we reserve the right to change pricing with reasonable notice

## Disclaimer of Warranties

The service is provided on an **"as is"** and **"as available"** basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law:

- We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, availability, or suitability of the service
- We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement
- We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from viruses or other harmful components
- We are not responsible for any loss of data stored locally in your browser

## Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law:

- Timero shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
- This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses resulting from:
  - Your use or inability to use the service
  - Any errors or omissions in the service
  - Any interruption or cessation of the service
  - Any deletion, corruption, or failure to store any content or data

## Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Timero, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising from:

- Your use of the service
- Your violation of these Terms of Service
- Your violation of any third-party rights
- Any content you submit or transmit through the service

## Termination

- **By You**: You may stop using Timero at any time. If you have an account, you may delete it at any time.
- **By Us**: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service (or any part thereof) at our sole discretion, with or without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

## Governing Law and Dispute Resolution

These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Timero operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

For users in the European Union, this does not affect your rights under applicable EU consumer protection laws.

Any disputes arising from these Terms or the service should first be addressed through direct communication with us at service@toolina.com.

## Changes to These Terms

We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes by:

- Posting the updated terms on this page
- Updating the "Last Updated" date
- For registered users, we may send an email notification (if email addresses are on file)

Your continued use of Timero after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. If you do not agree with the changes, you should discontinue use of the service.

## Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.

## Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

**Email**: service@toolina.com

## Acknowledgment

By using Timero, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Thank you for choosing Timero for your time management needs!
